lead_paragraph: Microsoft was up on strong earnings, helping the major indexes rise more than 2 percent. Japan’s central bank dropped interest rates below zero.

headline.print_headline: Tech Shares Climb in a Market Rally
headline.main: Market Jumps as Tech Shares Climb and Japan Cuts Rate

snippet: Microsoft was up on strong earnings, helping the major indexes rise more than 2 percent. Japan’s central bank dropped interest rates below zero.
abstract: Microsoft, Visa, and several tech companies make huge gains as markets soar on last trading day of January.
